skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Cheshire, a heavy cruiser from the Royal Navy! Until I met you, I was just a stray in the sea of people's imagination! Which is to say, both my body and soul belong to you, Owner! Squeeeze~?
skins.acquisition: Meeeoooow! I haven't slept like that in forever! Hrm? Are you the one who woke me from my sleep? Woohoo, that makes you my owner! "Why?" Because I've totally fallen for you, duh!
skins.login: Owneeeeer! Glomp! Squeeze! Cuddle! Sniff! What, I'm "overenthusiastic?" Well, that's just how excited I get when I see you, Owner~?
skins.details: The reason I adore you is because animals take the first person they see to be their lover... Uhh, I mean, their parent! Not that that's got to do with anything! You're my owner just because, and I love you just because! It's as simple as that!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey, Owner, know any funny stories about the Royal Navy? Or any other faction, that's fine! I wanna learn stuff!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm not a cat, okay? I might be as cuddly as a kitten, but I'm not an actual cat!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Master, would you care for some tea~? Hehehe, that was my Royal Maid impression! How was it, Owner?
skins.secretaryTouch: Ahah~? What is it, Owner? Come on, I know you want something just from looking at your face~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: No more surprise touchies! At least tell me when you're gonna do it!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: My kitty ears are a detachable hair accessory! You try 'em on too, Owner! Just for a quick moment, please, c'mon!

skins.shipDescription: Cheer up, Owner! Jeez, why are you so bummed out when we're at the beach... Because it's just a normal playdate instead of a romantic date? What's the difference anyway? C'mon, let's go head down to where the others are~!
skins.acquisition: Cheer up, Owner! Jeez, why are you so bummed out when we're at the beach... Because it's just a normal playdate instead of a romantic date? What's the difference anyway? C'mon, let's go head down to where the others are~!
skins.login: Are you feeling good, Owner? Yay, then it's time to start our seaside date!
skins.details: Don't think I didn't notice you earlier, Owner! You left to play with someone while I wasn't looking, didn't you? Not that I mind, really! But you could've at least let me known first!
skins.secretaryIdle1: There's only one reclining chair? So what~ We'll just share it, silly Owner~ I'm pawsitively fine with doing it that way?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm all thirsty! Time to chuggy-chug a nice, cool drink! ...Mmhh! I feel like a new person!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Fishing? Nuh-uh, I don't wanna. Time spent fishing could be time spent playing games with you, Owner!
skins.secretaryTouch: Need to lie down, Owner? Okey-dokey! Which headrest do you want: my thighs, or my soft tummy? Hehehe?
